title: new Image model
descText: Generate complex imgaes with the brand new and powerful WAN 2.2 model. Exceptional prompt adherence and ultra-realistics textures.

title: Open source model
descText: We're making the weights to our FLUX.1 Krea model open-source. Download and run our model weights, read the technical report, or generate with it in Krea Image.

title: Motion Transfer model
descText: Bring motion into your characters. Upload any image, record a video of yourself, and make your characters smile, talk, and dance. Powered by Runway Act 2.

title: new Video model
descText: Announcing Realtime Video. Generate videos in real-time. Fully frame-consistent, controllable video clips.
